about_the_game: In *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP DROPPER EXPANSION, enjoy 4 new dropper maps at launch, and tons of hours of fun. Which are extremely challenging and fun droppers for you to toy around with inside of the game. Additionally, there will be more maps getting added every now and then.

short_description: Drop down holes as your scuffed bean in *NEW* SCUFFED EPIC BHOP DROPPER EXPANSION! Including extremely challenging and fun droppers for you to toy around with inside of the game. Additionally, there will be more maps getting added every now and then.
